product_name: Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top - Men's
long_description: Made with, stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric, the men's Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top uses reflective features to help you stand out in the early morning or after the sun goes down. Dri-FIT(R) fabric wicks sweat away from skin and dries quickly to help keep you comfortable during intense exercise. Mock neck zips up to the chin for coverage when it's cold. Top features a screen-printed upper body and sleeves with mesh overlays for style and enhanced breathability. Elastic cuffs and hem offer a snug, comfortable fit. The men's Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top features flat seams that minimize chafing.
short_description: Made with, stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric, the men's Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top uses reflective features to help you stand out in the early morning or after the sun goes down.
